pageTitle: Email Settings - IMAP & POP3 | TalkTalk Help
textBeforeTable: Please see below the email settings for @talktalk.net: If you have already set up your client to work with POP3 do not change the settings to IMAP. If you are setting up the account for the first time we recommend that you use the IMAP settings. Important notice } text-align:right; { td.right1
textAfterTable: NOTE: When adding your TalkTalk email account to Windows 8 mail be sure to use the IMAP settings above.  Forgotten password? Password helper Need step by step instructions? Setup guides Having problems? Client troubleshooting   @tiscali.co.uk Important notice If you have already set up your client to work with POP3 do not change the settings to IMAP. If you are setting up the account for the first time we recommend that you use the IMAP settings. Setting Type IMAP (recommended) POP3 Login username@tiscali.co.uk username@tiscali.co.uk Incoming email server imap.tiscali.co.uk pop.tiscali.co.uk Incoming Port 143 110 Outgoing email (SMTP) smtp.tiscali.co.uk smtp.tiscali.co.uk Outgoing Port 587 587
